pageTitle: Itinerary for Friday, June 3, 2016 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Friday, June 3, 2016:

8:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will meet with the Mayor of Winnipeg, Brian Bowman.

Executive Board Room
RBC Convention Centre, North Building
375 York Avenue
Winnipeg, Manitoba

Notes for media:

  • Photo opportunity only
  • Media should arrive no later than 7:30 a.m.


9:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will deliver remarks at the Federation of Canadian Municipalities’ 2016 Annual Conference and Tradeshow.

Plenary Hall
RBC Convention Centre
375 York Avenue
Winnipeg, Manitoba

Notes for media:

  • Media should arrive at York Room 1 no later than 7:30 a.m.
  • Open media coverage


10:15 a.m. The Prime Minister will hold a media availability.

York Room 1
RBC Convention Centre
375 York Avenue
Winnipeg, Manitoba

Notes for media:

  • Open media coverage


2:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will meet with the Premier of Manitoba, Brian Pallister.

Executive Board Room
RBC Convention Centre, North Building
375 York Avenue
Winnipeg, Manitoba

Notes for media:

  • Photo opportunity only
  • Media should arrive no later than 2:00 p.m.


Media appearance

11:30 a.m. – live on the Aboriginal Peoples Television Network (APTN).

The Prime Minister will participate in a town hall with APTN in Winnipeg, Manitoba.


Please note: all times are local.

PMO Media Relations:
Media@pmo-cpm.gc.ca
613-957-5555
